attributes.name: Best Brunches in Dubai
attributes.description: Brunch is a Dubai institution that will never go out of style. Whether your brunch goals are to party, chill out, or the sole aim is to devour as much as possible, we've got you covered on some of the best and most appropriate brunches in Dubai.

attributes.name: Easter Celebrations in Dubai
attributes.description: It's the season to go egg hunting, feast on delicacies and indulge in family festivities - it's Easter time! Make your festivities this year unforgettable with some of the best spots in Dubai to enjoy an exciting Easter meal with delicious food and fun activities.
